page.title: 16PINE VIEW STABLES
page.content: These stables are in Blofield Heath and have about 19 horses and ponies. They also own a donkey. Sometimes two of the mares have foals which are reared at the stables. Besides the stables there is a school field where people can learn to ride and jump, but most people who can ride prefer to go for a hack (or ride) around the lanes in the area. In the autumn when the crops have been harvested, you can also ride across the stubble fields. During the week and at night the horses are put into a large field, where they can graze, though there is a shelter for them and a supply of water. Several young people who like horses and riding, help with the schooling and with mucking out the stables.
